weapon.Buff_DsThu_SSR_Level1_des: Attacking targets from behind increases crit rate of all dual blades attacks by 40%. Backstabbing an electrified target increases crit rate by 100% and crit damage by 30%.
weapon.Buff_DsThu_SSR_Level3_des: Increase damage by 30% to targets with less than 60% HP.
weapon.Buff_DsThu_SSR_Level5_Crit4S: Attacks are guaranteed to crit and increase crit damage by 50% for 4 seconds.
weapon.Buff_DsThu_SSR_Level5_des: Triggering a Back Attack grants a 100% crit chance for the next 4 seconds and increases crit damage by 50%. Cooldown: 10 seconds.
weapon.Buff_DsThu_SSR_Level6_des: After using a skill, increase volt damage dealt to the target by 20% for 20 seconds.
